Title: Challenges Experienced and Observed during the Implementation of Leprosy Strategies, Sidama Region, Southern Ethiopia: An inductive thematic analysis of qualitative study among health professionals who working with leprosy programs

Kebede Tefera Betru: Hawassa University, College of Medicine and Health Sciences, School of Public Health, Hawassa, Ethiopia
Thuledi Makua: University of South Africa, College of Human Sciences, Pretoria, South Africa
